title: [娱乐][全翻译]RPG Missions - 0.6 —— 创建你自己的任务吧！[1.7.2-R0.3]
author: abc3527527
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:02 编辑 




minecraft__140227211000.jpg.-m1.png (268.93 KB, 下载次数: 161)

下载附件

2014-10-27 19:29 上传





帖子原文
Basic Idea:You ever wanted to create and play your own missions in Minecraft?! This is the right plugin for you! With this plugin you can create your own mission, add tasks to them and create a NPC as the mission's host. In addition you can add rewards to the mission that a player will receive when he finishes the mission.Features:- Create missions 
- Create NPCs as a mission's host 
- Add tasks to a mission with a specific task type("collecttask", "killtask" ) 
- Add rewards to a mission, with custom nam, lore and enchantment 
- The mission's npc is full interactive 
- Every player can enable a Scoreboard called Missionboard, it shows all current tasks from a player 
- More features will be added in the future!
Commands:- /ms = Gives you a list of all commands 
- /ms createmission <Mission name> = Creates a mission with the given name(You can use "_" in the name it will change to space ;) ) 
- /ms removemission <mission id> = Removes a mission by id 
- /ms createnpc <mission id> <npc name> = Creates a npc for the given mission and name at your position 
- /ms removenpc <mission id> = Removes the npc for the given mission 
- /ms addtask <mission id> <task type> = Adds a tasks to the given mission 
- /ms removetask <mission id> <task id> = Removes a task from a mission 
- /ms addreward <mission id> = Adds a reward to the mission
- /ms removereward <mission id> <item id> = Removes a reward from a mission 
- /ms listmissions = List all available missions 
- /ms listtasks = Lists your current tasks 
- /ms listtasks <mission id> = List all tasks for the given mission 
- /ms board = Enables/Disables your Missionboard 
- /ms cancel <mission id> = Cancels a specific mission
Permissions:To gain full access you need the permission: 
- "ms.admin" 

To auto enable Missionboard on join: 
- "ms.auto.board"



翻译使用双语，这样方便其他人指错。

Basic Idea(基本介绍):You ever wanted to create and play your own missions in Minecraft?! This is the right plugin for you! With this plugin you can create your own mission, add tasks to them and create a NPC as the mission's host. In addition you can add rewards to the mission that a player will receive when he finishes the mission.
你曾经有没有想过在minecraft中创建并完成任务？这个插件就是为你而生的！使用这个插件你可以创建你自己的任务，让NPC来布置任务！此外，玩家完成任务可以得到你添加的奖励。

Features(插件特点):
- Create missions  (可以创建丰富多样的任务)
- Create NPCs as a mission's host (可以创建NPC来布置你的任务)
- Add tasks to a mission with a specific task type("collecttask", "killtask" )  (可以分类任务)
- Add rewards to a mission, with custom nam, lore and enchantment (可以添加任务奖励)
- The mission's npc is full interactive  (可以与任务NPC互动)
- Every player can enable a Scoreboard called Missionboard, it shows all current tasks from a player (任务榜)

这些不怎么重要我就随便弄弄了哈    ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------→_→其实是我懒

Commands(指令):      红字部分为指令 等号后面是原文 括号里是翻译- /ms = Gives you a list of all commands【显示所有指令】 
- /ms createmission <Mission name> = Creates a mission with the given name(You can use "_" in the name it will change to space ;) ) 【创建一个任务并命名(你可以在命名时用_代替空格)】
- /ms removemission <mission id> = Removes a mission by id 【移除一个任务】
- /ms createnpc <mission id> <npc name> = Creates a npc for the given mission and name at your position 【在你的位置创建并命名一个NPC来布置任务】
- /ms removenpc <mission id> = Removes the npc for the given mission 【删除布置任务的NPC】
- /ms addtask <mission id> <task type> = Adds a tasks to the given mission 【添加 完成一个任务后获得另一个任务】
- /ms removetask <mission id> <task id> = Removes a task from a mission 【完成一个任务删除另一个任务】
- /ms addreward <mission id> = Adds a reward to the mission 【添加一个任务的奖励】
- /ms removereward <mission id> <item id> = Removes a reward from a mission 【删除一个任务的奖励】
- /ms listmissions = List all available missions  【查看所有可用的任务】
- /ms listtasks = Lists your current tasks 【查看你的任务】 
- /ms listtasks <mission id> = List all tasks for the given mission 【查看一个任务的后续任务】
- /ms board = Enables/Disables your Missionboard 【开启/关闭 任务板】
- /ms cancel <mission id> = Cancels a specific mission【放弃一个任务】

Permissions(权限):
To gain full access you need the permission(获得你需要的插件的所有权限): 
- "ms.admin" 

To auto enable Missionboard on join(自动使任务板加入任务): 
- "ms.auto.board"

翻译半天累死我了( ?_ゝ｀)
